WRITING.TEXT: ballet. It wasnt really the dancing that bothered me so much as being forced to wear a skirt. Even now I refuse to wear a skirt/dress unless its a special occasion, such as Halloween or funerals.

WRITING.TITLE: TIL An English engineer named Edward Naime invented the eraser in 1770. Up until that time, people usually used rolled-up pieces of white bread to erase pencil marks.

WRITING.TEXT: thanks. I think I might try that. it seems like a cool idea.
